fields.label: Testimonial Template
fields.name: testimonial_template
fields.instructions:
Only for testimonial background type only. Use tags below
{testimony} {image} {name} {position}

sub_fields.label: View Button Label
sub_fields.name: object_button_label
sub_fields.instructions: Leave empty so button is not visible.

fields.label: Fill in empty
fields.name: fill_in_empty
fields.instructions: If the post result is less than the column number, fill the remaining

fields.label: Force Category/Taxonomy
fields.name: display_category
fields.instructions: To force {category} tag to return value even category/taxonomy is not set.

fields.label: Custom Taxonomy
fields.name: custom_taxonomy
fields.instructions: If you checked Force Category/Taxonomy, you will need the custom taxonomy name if the post type is a custom one.

fields.label: Override Template
fields.name: override_template
fields.instructions:
Override template use these template tags:
{title} {image_url} {permalink} {category} {excerpt} {content} {acf_field_name:function_name} {dummy:function_name}

fields.label: Type
fields.name: gm_type
fields.instructions: Use Address to input multiple addresses. Use Custom to set the function name and return array of addresses and content eg: [array('address' => 'address', 'content' => 'content'), ... ]

fields.label: Template
fields.name: template
fields.instructions:
Use this template snippets: {image} {date} {excerpt} {title} {permalink} {category} {acf_field_name:function_name} {dummy:function_name}:
function_name(value,post) is your current custom function.

fields.label: Search post types
fields.name: search_post_types
fields.instructions: Enter post types separated by comma

fields.label: Exclude Post IDs
fields.name: exclude_post_ids
fields.instructions: Add IDs of post that you like to exclude from search.

fields.label: Post categories
fields.name: post_categories
fields.instructions: Enter post categories separated by comma

fields.label: Terms/Tags
fields.name: post_taxonomies
fields.instructions: Enter post taxonomies separated by comma

fields.label: Taxonomy Option
fields.name: post_taxonomies_option
fields.instructions: Enter post taxonomies separated by comma

sub_fields.label: Taxonomy
sub_fields.name: taxonomy
sub_fields.instructions: The main taxonomy against the terms
